official_title: To amend the vaccine injury compensation portion of the Public Health Service Act to permit a petition for compensation to be submitted within 48 months of the first symptoms of injury.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to permit a petition for vaccine injury compensation to be submitted within 48 (currently, 36) months of the first symptom or manifestation of onset, or of the significant aggravation, of injury if the vaccine was administered after a specified date.
